attributes.action: Stop the export of arms to Saudi Arabia
attributes.additional_details: Saudis Arabia has not only created a war in Yemen, they are also blockading humanitarian aid, medical aid and basic food and water to the suffering Yemenis. Calling on the UK government to remove their support of the Saudi government and to put pressure on them to cease this war that has brought famine to Yemen
attributes.background: Stop exporting arms and creating trade deals with Saudi Arabia
